channel.title: Authors on Saumya Gaurang Shah
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Saumya Gaurang Shah

item.description:
I am a senior year undergraduate at Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur (IITK), majoring in Electrical Engineering with a Double Major in Computer Science and Engineering. Currently, I am on a semester exchange at EPFL in Computer Science. I am working on developing machine learning techniques for education in CHILI Lab, advised by Prof. Pierre Dillenbourg. I also did a Summer@EPFL 2019 research internship here.

Previously, I contributed to the open source probabilistic programming library Turing.jl as part of the Julia Seasons of Contributions program. I have done projects in Robotics under Prof. Ketan Rajawat (IITK). I did interns at Auquan Inc. and Kritsnam Technologies. I have also done projects on Machine Learning at IITK. For more details, please have a look at my CV here.

I like discussions on philosophy and politics. I love playing Table Tennis. Do contact me if you are up for a match or two ;)
